Uses of Class
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ServerMessageToClient

Packages that use ServerMessageToClient
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver Provides the classes to create a TCP / UDP socket server that communicates using custom serialized Java messages objects. 
org.codemonkey.swiftworldserver Provides the classes to create a World Server, an extension of the Request Socket Server. 
 

Uses of ServerMessageToClient in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
 

Subclasses of ServerMessageToClient in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
(package private)  class ServerMessageToClientPingPong
          Message that encodes pong messages.
 

Fields in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver with type parameters of type ServerMessageToClient
private  Map<Class<? extends ServerMessageToClient>,Integer> SwiftSocketServer.serverMessageToClientIdList
          Used to prepend the right binary packet code for a given ServerMessageToClient type.
 

Methods in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver with parameters of type ServerMessageToClient
 void SwiftSocketServer.broadcastMessage(ServerMessageToClient message)
           
private  void ClientHandler.sendMessage(ClientContext clientContext, int messageId, ServerMessageToClient message)
          Helper method used to send a message to the client.
 void SwiftSocketServer.sendMessage(ServerMessageToClient message)
          Finds the right client handler based on the message's client context and sends the message to it.
 void ClientHandler.sendMessage(ServerMessageToClient message)
          Logs and sends a response message to the current client using ClientHandler.clientContext, delegating the actual sending to ClientHandler.sendMessage(ClientContext, int, ServerMessageToClient), unless the client has said 'Bye Bye' in which case the message to be sent is ignored altogether.

Uses of ServerMessageToClient in org.codemonkey.swiftworldserver
 

Methods in org.codemonkey.swiftworldserver with parameters of type ServerMessageToClient
 void WorldServer.broadcastMessage(ServerMessageToClient serverMessage)
          Send a message to all connected clients ignoring the client context in the message, by delegating this call to SwiftSocketServer.broadcastMessage(ServerMessageToClient).
 void WorldServer.sendMessage(ServerMessageToClient serverMessage)
          Sends a message to the client context stored in the message by delegating this call to SwiftSocketServer.sendMessage(ServerMessageToClient).
 

Method parameters in org.codemonkey.swiftworldserver with type arguments of type ServerMessageToClient
 void WorldServer.registerServerMessageToClientId(int messageId, Class<? extends ServerMessageToClient> messageType)
          Registers a server-to-client message on the given unique identifier on the swift socket server, by delegating to SwiftSocketServer.registerServerMessageToClientId(int, Class).
